function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective indoor navigation leading to increased contact with other people","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Development of efficient indoor navigation systems and occupancy management strategies","Technologies":"IoT sensors, crowd and occupancy analytics, smart indoor navigation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, smart building operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning due to lack of understanding of indoor mobility data","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to contaminated areas","Mitigation":"Development of analytics techniques to understand indoor mobility, and frequent cleaning of high-traffic areas","Technologies":"IoT sensors, analytics tools, cleaning robots","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building management, cleaning service providers"},{"Description":"Insufficient integration of data leading to ineffective deployment of context-aware devices","Impact":"Inability to identify and clean areas visited by individuals with elevated temperatures, leading to potential virus transmission","Mitigation":"Effective integration and analysis of data from disparate sources for context-awareness, utilization of data for identifying and cleaning high-risk areas","Technologies":"Data integration tools, smart devices, disinfection robots","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building management, smart device operators"}]}
